item.title: Kalou and Bosingwa leave Chelsea
item.description: LONDON (Reuters) – Salomon Kalou and Jose Bosingwa, who featured in Chelsea’s Champions League final win over Bayern Munich in May, have left the London club. Ivory Coast striker Kalou and former Portugal defender Bosingwa are now free agents after the European champions opted not to renew their contracts, the club said on their website [...]

item.title: World Cup 2014 up next for all-conquering Spain
item.description: KIEV: By thrashing Italy 4-0 in Sunday’s Euro 2012 final in Kiev, Spain staked a claim to the title of the greatest international team of all time. Not even Zinedine Zidane’s France, or West Germany’s great team of the mid-1970s, had ever successfully defended the European Championship before. Not even the many famous Brazil teams, [...]
